trans-unit.source: Creates and manages the threads that run workflow instances on the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: 建立和管理在工作流程執行階段引擎上執行工作流程執行個體的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService> is used by the workflow runtime engine by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService> 預設由工作流程執行階段引擎使用，

trans-unit.source: It includes default support for having multiple workflow instances queued in the runtime thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 其中包括可在執行階段執行緒集區佇列中有多個工作流程執行個體的預設支援。

trans-unit.source: If you want to control the thread that is responsible for executing the workflow, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要控制負責執行工作流程的執行緒，請使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> that holds initialization information.
trans-unit.target: 留存初始化資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is invoked when the workflow runtime engine loads services from an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 當工作流程執行階段引擎從應用程式組態檔載入服務時，會叫用此建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The only valid parameter is `maxSimultaneousWorkflows`, which can specify the number of workflows that can be run at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 唯一有效的參數是 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows`，這個參數可指定能夠同時執行的工作流程數。

trans-unit.source: Setting `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` to a high value might cause the .NET thread pool to starve.
trans-unit.target: 將 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` 設定為較高的值可能會導致 .NET 執行緒集區變空。

trans-unit.source: This could cause time-outs when a persistence service tries to complete a persistence transaction because <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> objects also use the .NET thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會在持續性服務嘗試完成持續性交易時造成逾時，因為 <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> 物件也會使用 .NET 執行緒集區。

trans-unit.source: If not specified in a constructor or configuration file, the default value for `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` is 5 for a single-processor machine, and (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8) for a multiple-processor machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在建構函式或組態檔中指定，單一處理器電腦的 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` 預設值是 5，而多處理器電腦則是 (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8)。

trans-unit.source: Note that (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8) is not always the same as (int)(4 * Environment.ProcessorCount), because of the rules of integer arithmetic.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，(int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8) 會因為整數算術的規則，而不一定與 (int)(4 * Environment.ProcessorCount) 相同。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parameters" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 包含 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: One of the key values in the <paramref name="parameters" /> collection contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 集合中的其中一個索引鍵值包含 null 參考 (<see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: One of the key values in the <paramref name="parameters" /> collection does not match the default key for <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 集合中的其中一個索引鍵值與 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService" /> 的預設索引鍵不相符。

trans-unit.source: One of the parameters cannot be converted to a double-precision floating point number that matches <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService.MaxSimultaneousWorkflows" />.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個參數無法轉換為符合 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService.MaxSimultaneousWorkflows" /> 的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService.MaxSimultaneousWorkflows" /> is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService.MaxSimultaneousWorkflows" /> 小於 1。

trans-unit.source: An integer that determines the maximum number of workflow instances that can be stored in the thread pool queue.
trans-unit.target: 整數，決定執行緒集區佇列可儲存的工作流程執行個體數上限。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService" /> class by using the specified maximum number of workflow instances that the service can run simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 使用服務能夠同時執行，而且數目達指定上限的工作流程執行個體，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Setting `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` to a high value might cause the .NET thread pool to starve.
trans-unit.target: 將 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` 設定為較高的值可能會導致 .NET 執行緒集區變空。

trans-unit.source: This could cause time-outs when a persistence service tries to complete a persistence transaction because <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> objects also use the .NET thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會在持續性服務嘗試完成持續性交易時造成逾時，因為 <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> 物件也會使用 .NET 執行緒集區。

trans-unit.source: If not specified in a constructor or configuration file, the default value for `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` is 5 for a single-processor machine, and (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8) for a multiple-processor machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在建構函式或組態檔中指定，單一處理器電腦的 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` 預設值是 5，而多處理器電腦則是 (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8)。

trans-unit.source: Note that (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8) is not always the same as (int)(4 * Environment.ProcessorCount), because of the rules of integer arithmetic.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，(int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8) 會因為整數算術的規則，而不一定與 (int)(4 * Environment.ProcessorCount) 相同。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="maxSimultaneousWorkflows" /> is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="maxSimultaneousWorkflows" /> 小於 1。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associated with the existing scheduled work item to cancel.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，與要取消的現有排程工作項目關聯。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the specified existing workflow instance work item.
trans-unit.target: 取消指定的現有工作流程執行個體工作項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timerId" /> is an empty GUID.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timerId" /> 是空的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of workflow instances that can be stored in the thread pool queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行緒集區佇列可以儲存的工作流程執行個體數目上限。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the maximum number of workflow instances that can be stored in the thread pool queue.
trans-unit.target: 整數，代表執行緒集區佇列可儲存的工作流程執行個體數上限。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this method is 5 for a single-processor machine, and (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8) for a multiple-processor machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果是單處理器電腦，這個方法的預設值是 5；如果是多處理器電腦，則是 (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8)。

trans-unit.source: Note that (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8) is not always the same as (int)(4 * Environment.ProcessorCount), because of the rules of integer arithmetic.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，(int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8) 會因為整數算術的規則，而不一定與 (int)(4 * Environment.ProcessorCount) 相同。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService" /> that a workflow instance has started to run.
trans-unit.target: 通知 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService" /> 工作流程執行個體已開始執行。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService.OnStarted%2A> creates a thread for the first work item in the list of items waiting to be included in the workflow instance thread pool.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService.OnStarted%2A> 會為等待加入工作流程執行個體執行緒集區之項目清單中的第一個工作項目建立執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Adds a workflow instance to the pending work items queue.
trans-unit.target: 將工作流程執行個體加入至暫止的工作項目佇列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitCallback" /> multicast delegate that represents the method to run.
trans-unit.target: 代表要執行之方法的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitCallback" /> 多點傳送委派。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that represents the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 代表工作流程執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a workflow instance to the pending work items queue using the specified workflow instance using the specified multicast delegate.
trans-unit.target: 使用透過指定之多點傳送委派的指定工作流程執行個體，將工作流程執行個體加入至暫止的工作項目佇列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitCallback> constructor to create your delegate method to run in the new thread.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.Threading.WaitCallback> 建構函式建立委派方法，使其在新的執行緒中執行。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="callback" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callback" /> 包含 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitCallback" /> multicast delegate that represents the method to run.
trans-unit.target: 代表要執行之方法的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitCallback" /> 多點傳送委派。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that represents the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 代表工作流程執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that indicates the time to begin running the thread.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示開始執行執行緒的時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that represents the scheduled thread.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，表示排定的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified workflow instance to the pending work item queue using the specified multicast delegate, <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> and GUIDs.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的多點傳送委派、<see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 和 GUID，將指定的工作流程執行個體加入至暫止工作項目佇列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitCallback> constructor to create your delegate method to run in the new thread.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.Threading.WaitCallback> 建構函式建立委派方法，使其在新的執行緒中執行。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="callback" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callback" /> 包含 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="workflowInstanceId" /> or <paramref name="timerId" /> is an empty GUID.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="workflowInstanceId" /> 或 <paramref name="timerId" /> 是空的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Stops the currently running thread on the workflow instance and any timers that are running.
trans-unit.target: 停止目前正在工作流程執行個體上執行的執行緒，以及任何正在執行的計時器。
